## CustomHttpHeaders interface

Allows users to specify additional values for specific HTTP headers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomHttpHeaders extends AdditionalHttpHeaders 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [AdditionalHttpHeaders](./answers-headless.additionalhttpheaders.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ["Client-SDK"?](./answers-headless.customhttpheaders._client-sdk_.md) | [CustomClientSDKHeaderValues](./answers-headless.customclientsdkheadervalues.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Additional agents and their versions used to create the Answers experience. The information for these agents is added to the Client-SDK HTTP header for Answers API requests along with that of the ANSWERS\_HEADLESS and ANSWERS\_CORE agents. |
